thread.title: Amanah Colocation Deal With Seneca College
thread.title_full: Amanah Announces New Colocation Deal With Seneca College

author: Alex Monteiro
title: Amanah Colocation Deal With Seneca College
text:
Amanah Tech Inc, one of the top hosting providers in Canada, has recently finalized a colocation deal with Seneca College. A Canadian college with campuses situated throughout the Toronto area, Seneca was in 2011 recognized as one of Canada’s best diversity employers. It offers a wide range of different programs which allow students to partner with industry leaders and access the latest in hands-on computer technology. In order to better serve its students, Seneca began colocation of its computing infrastructure at Amanah’s 1 Yonge Street facility on July 6.
Since its inception in 1967, Seneca has remained devoted to providing students with teaching that goes beyond rote memorization. The institution has long prided itself on being a transformational leader in the field of education, with graduates moving on to success in a variety of different fields. ever devoted to quality, they found themselves impressed by Amanah’s facilities.
“When you’ve a client and employee base as widely-dispersed as Seneca’s, it can be difficult to handle the infrastructure costs associated with supporting both,” explained Amanah’s Nezar Freeny. “By hosting with us, Seneca is able to provide both students and teachers with all the computing infrastructure they require without breaking their budget. What’s more, our facility gives them all the room for expansion they could possibly need.”
Freeny moved on to emphasize that Seneca’s devotion to quality is not unlike Amanah’s own.
“We’ve always been devoted to providing our clients with the best service possible,” said Freeny. “That, more than our prices and specs, is why Seneca chose to colocate with us - and it’s why they’ll continue with us for the foreseeable future.”
About Amanah:
Founded in 2001, Amanah has always strived to be the best in the industry at understanding - and providing for - the technological needs of online businesses. With a data center in 151 Front Street, Canada’s top point of presence, Amanah is well-equipped to serve its large client base, offering domestic addresses in both Canada and the United States. Amanah clients enjoy a direct connection to some of Canada’s top ISPs along with unmetered bandwidth, enterprise-grade speed and hardware, powerful security and a 100% Uptime SLA. For more information, visit http://amanah.com/
